actions: Cools the Blood, stops bleeding, clears Toxic Heat, astringes fluids and generates flesh.
With Huai Hua Mi, for hot, bleeding hemorrhoids or other Intestinal bleeding.
Cools the Blood, cools the Liver and stops bleeding.
Clears and drains Large Intestine Heat and reduces swelling and pain.
Promotes the movement of Qi and reduces distention and pressure.
Regulates Qi, reduces accumulations, drains downward and unblocks the bowels.
Promotes the movement of Qi, alleviates pain, adjusts and regulates stagnant Qi in the Intestines and dispels Damp-Heat.
With Bing Lang, relieves tenesmus and the passage of mucus in dysenteric disorders.

syndromes: Hemorrhoidal bleeding with pain, constipation and distention
